EmailTemplate.name: TM 2-Package Not Offered
EmailTemplate.subject: TM 2-Package Not Offered
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear <Customer Name>,
Thank you for your interest in LegalZoom's trademark services. We received your inquiry about the pricing of the LegalZoom Trademark Package and wanted to address your questions.
Our trademark application pricing varies by state. In some states, we are able to offer 2 packages ? a Basic Package for $169 and a Complete Coverage Package for $189 which includes access to our Business Advantage Pro service. In states where we do not offer the Business Advantage Pro service, we offer 3 LegalZoom Trademark Packages ? a Standard Package for $169, a Plus Package for $289, and a Gold Package for $389. Note: The pricing listed does not include the government filing fee. Each package will require a government filing fee of at least $325 to be paid at or prior to LegalZoom's filing of your trademark application.
We understand your concern and assure you that we are working with all 50 states so that we can provide consistent offerings for all our customers.
Please call us at 888-791-0227 M-F from 6am to 7pm Pacific so that we can assist you. We value you as a customer and would like to work with you to determine the package that would best fit your trademark needs.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
